committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Community College to Career Fund in Higher Education Act
This bill requires the Department of Education and the Department of Labor to award grants to community colleges for education and workforce training programs or related activities. Such programs or activities must lead to or expand opportunities for students to obtain recognized postsecondary credentials (e.g., associate degrees or industry-recognized certifications).
